snippet: A man who long made his living from physical books says the arguments against e-book devices miss a key point: for most printed matter, the value is in the content, not the physical form.
abstract: A man who long made his living from physical books says the arguments against e-book devices miss a key point: for most printed matter, the value is in the content, not the physical form.

headline.main: Former Book Designer Says Good Riddance to Print

snippet: Accessories makers are are likely to take advantage of all the things an iPad lacks--camera, webcam, keyboard, memory card slot, video game controls, a cable to link to an HDTV's HDMI outlet.
abstract: Accessories makers are are likely to take advantage of all the things an iPad lacks--camera, webcam, keyboard, memory card slot, video game controls, a cable to link to an HDTV's HDMI outlet.

snippet: Along with the new Countryman crossover, Mini introduced a new in-car infotainment system in Geneva.
abstract: Along with the new Countryman crossover, Mini introduced a new in-car infotainment system in Geneva.

snippet: Apple announced the date when the Wi-Fi version of the iPad will arrive in United States stores. The models that can also access AT&T's 3G network will be coming later in April.
abstract: Apple announced the date when the Wi-Fi version of the iPad will arrive in United States stores. The models that can also access AT&T's 3G network will be coming later in April.

headline.main: Apple iPad to Arrive in Stores on April 3

snippet: Apple said on Friday that it would start selling its iPad multimedia tablet in the United States on April 3, a few days later than originally planned. The company will initially sell models that connect to the Internet using Wi-Fi networks, starti...
abstract: Apple announces that it plans to begin selling its iPad tablet computer in United States on April 3; will initially sell $499 models that connect to Internet via Wi-Fi networks, with versions that can tap into mobile phone networks to follow at end of April (S)

headline.main: Apple Plans To Begin Selling Its iPad On April 3
